message.name: ERR_XRV_PROGRAM_GROUP_LINKS_EXIST
message.locale: Cannot delete this Program as it as a member of a Program Group.

message.name: ERR_XFV_NUM_WARNING_DAYS
message.locale: The number of Warning Days must be less than the Duration.

message.name: ERR_XFV_LEGACY_SYSTEM
message.locale: An Ongoing Integrated Case Type can only be specified when the Case Processing System is 'Curam'.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CURAM_SYSTEM
message.locale: An Ongoing Integrated Case Type or Outcome Plan Type must be specified when the Case Processing System is Curam.

message.name: ERR_XFV_OUTCOME_PLAN_CURAM_SYSTEM
message.locale: Outcome Plan Type can only be specified if the Case Processing System is Curam.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CLIENT_SELECTION_REQUIRED_PROGAUTH_PROGRAM_OUTCOME_PLAN_TYPE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Client Selection Strategy of the Outcome Plan must be specified if an Outcome Plan Type has been specified.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CLIENT_SELECTION_NOT_REQUIRED_PROGAUTH_APPLICATION
message.locale: Client Selection Strategy of the Outcome Plan cannot be specified as the application case specified has a Program Authorisation Strategy of Application.

message.name: ERR_XFV_PROGRAM_CLIENT_SELECTION_RULESET_REQUIRED_IF_STRATEGY_IS_RULES
message.locale: Client Selection Ruleset must be specified if the Client Selection Strategy of the Outcome Plan is Rules.
Client Selection Ruleset must be specified if the Client Selection Strategy of the Outcome Plan is Rules.

message.name: ERR_XFV_PROGRAM_CLIENT_SELECTION_RULESET_SPECIFIED_IF_STRATEGY_RULES_EXISTS
message.locale: Client Selection Ruleset can only be specified if the Client Selection Strategy of the Outcome Plan is Rules.
Client Selection Ruleset can only be specified if the Client Selection Strategy of the Outcome Plan is Rules.

message.name: ERR_XFV_PROGRAM_OUTCOME_PLAN_STRATEGY_REQUIRED_IF_OUTCOME_PLAN_TYPE_IS_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Outcome Plan Strategy must be specified if an Outcome Plan Type has been specified.
Outcome Plan Strategy must be specified if an Outcome Plan Type has been specified.

message.name: ERR_XFV_PROGRAM_OUTCOME_PLAN_STRATEGY_SPECIFIED_IF_OUTCOME_PLAN_TYPE_EXISTS
message.locale: Outcome Plan Strategy can only be specified if an Outcome Plan Type has been specified.
Outcome Plan Strategy can only be specified if an Outcome Plan Type has been specified.

message.name: ERR_XRV_NAME_UNIQUE
message.locale: The Name, %1s already exists.

message.name: ERR_XRV_REFERENCE_UNIQUE
message.locale: The Reference, %1s already exists.

message.name: ERR_XRV_NAME_NOT_UNIQUE
message.locale: The Name, %1s, already exists.

message.name: ERR_XRV_REFERENCE_NOT_UNIQUE
message.locale: The Reference, %1s, already exists.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_REFERENCE
message.locale: Reference must be entered.

message.name: ERR_XRV_NO_CURAM_LEGACY_SYSTEM
message.locale: You may only specify an External System if the Eligibility System is External System.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_LEGACY_SYSTEM
message.locale: You must specify an External System if the Eligibility System is External System.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_NAME
message.locale: You must specify a name for this program type.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_DESCRIPTION
message.locale: You must specify a description for this program type.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_SUMMARY
message.locale: You must specify a summary for this program type.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_TARGETSYSTEM
message.locale: The Target System must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_REFERENCE_SPACES
message.locale: Reference cannot contain blank spaces.

message.name: ERR_XFV_PROGRAM_DESCRIPTION_LENGTH_EXCEEDS_MAX_LENGTH
message.locale: The Program Description is too long. Please reduce the length of this Description.

message.name: ERR_XFV_PROGRAM_ONLINE_DESCRIPTION_LENGTH_EXCEEDS_MAX_LENGTH
message.locale: The Program Online Description is too long. Please reduce the length of this Description.

message.name: ERR_XFV_PROGRAM_ONLINE_SUMMARY_LENGTH_EXCEEDS_MAX_LENGTH
message.locale: The Program Online Summary is too long. Please reduce the length of this Summary.

message.name: ERR_XFV_PROGRAM_LOCAL_OFFICE_LENGTH_EXCEEDS_MAX_LENGTH
message.locale: The Program Local Office Application is too long. Please reduce the length of this field.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CASE_CONFIGURATION_MANDATORY_IF_CASE_TYPE_SET
message.locale: Case configuration must be specified if case type is set.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CASE_TYPE_MANDATORY_IF_CASE_CONFIGURATION_SET
message.locale: Case type must be specified if case configuration is set.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CASE_CONFIGURATION_MANDATORY_IF_INTAKE_SYSTEM_TYPE_CURAM
message.locale: Application Case must be specified if the Intake System is 'Curam'.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CASE_CONFIGURATION_BUT_INTAKE_SYSTEM_TYPE_NOT_CURAM
message.locale: Application Case can only be specified if the Intake System is 'Curam'.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CASE_PROCESSING_SYSTEM_MANDATORY_IF_INTAKE_SYSTEM_TYPE_CURAM
message.locale: Case Processing System must be specified if the Intake System is 'Curam'.

message.name: ERR_XFV_REMOTE_INTAKE_SYSTEM_MANDATORY_IF_INTAKE_SYSTEM_TYPE_NOT_CURAM
message.locale: Remote Intake System must be specified if the Intake System is not 'Curam'.

message.name: ERR_XFV_REMOTE_INTAKE_SYSTEM_BUT_INTAKE_SYSTEM_TYPE_CURAM
message.locale: Remote Intake System can only be specified if the Intake System is not 'Curam'.

message.name: ERR_XFV_REMOTE_INTAKE_SYSTEM_BUT_INTAKE_SYSTEM_TYPE_NOT_SET
message.locale: Intake System Type must be specified if Remote Intake System is set.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CLIENT_SELECTION_STRATEGY_IF_PROGRAM_AUTHORISATION_STRATEGY_IS_PROGRAM_AND_PRODUCT_SELECTED
message.locale: Client Selection Strategy of the Integrated Case must be specified as the application case specified has an Authorization Strategy of 'Program' and a Product Delivery Type has been selected.
Client Selection Strategy of the Integrated Case must be specified as the application case specified has an Authorisation Strategy of 'Program' and a Product Delivery Type has been selected.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CLIENT_SELECTION_STRATEGY_IF_PROGRAM_AUTHORISATION_STRATEGY_IS_APPLICATION
message.locale: Client Selection Strategy cannot be specified as the application case specified has an Authorization Strategy of 'Application'.
Client Selection Strategy cannot be specified as the application case specified has an Authorisation Strategy of 'Application'.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CLIENT_SELECTION_RULESET_IF_CLIENT_SELECTION_STRATEGY_IS_RULES
message.locale: Client Selection Ruleset must be specified if the Client Selection Strategy is 'Rules'.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CLIENT_SELECTION_RULESET_ONLY_IF_CLIENT_SELECTION_STRATEGY_IS_RULES
message.locale: Client Selection Ruleset can only be specified if the Client Selection Strategy is 'Rules'.

message.name: ERR_XFV_INTEGRATED_CASE_STRATEGY_IF_ONGOING_INTEGRATED_CASE
message.locale: Integrated Case Strategy Type must be specified if an Ongoing Integrated Case has been specified.

message.name: ERR_XFV_INTEGRATED_CASE_STRATEGY_ONLY_IF_ONGOING_INTEGRATED_CASE
message.locale: Integrated Case Strategy can only be specified if an Ongoing Integrated Case has been specified.

message.name: ERR_XFV_PRODUCT_DELIVERY_TYPE_IF_ONGOING_INTEGRATED_CASE
message.locale: Product Delivery Type can only be specified when the Ongoing Integrated Case Type has been specified.

message.name: ERR_XFV_SUBMIT_PRODUCT_DELIVERY_IF_PRODUCT_DELIVERY_TYPE
message.locale: Submit Product Delivery can only be specified if Product Delivery Type has been specified.

message.name: ERR_XFV_START_DATE_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED_IF_DURATION
message.locale: The Start Date must be specified if Duration is entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_START_DATE_MUST_NOT_BE_SPECIFIED_IF_DURATION_NOT_SET
message.locale: Duration must be entered if the Start Date is specified.

message.name: ERR_XFV_WARNING_DAYS_MUST_NOT_BE_SPECIFIED_IF_DURATION_NOT_SET
message.locale: Duration must be entered if Warning Days is entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_USE_BUSINESS_DAYS_MUST_NOT_BE_SPECIFIED_IF_DURATION_NOT_SET
message.locale: Duration must be entered if Use Business Days is selected.

message.name: ERR_XFV_RESUME_TIMER_MUST_NOT_BE_SPECIFIED_IF_DURATION_NOT_SET
message.locale: Duration must be entered if Resume Timer is selected.

message.name: ERR_XFV_RESUME_FROM_MUST_NOT_BE_SPECIFIED_IF_DURATION_NOT_SET
message.locale: Duration must be entered if Resume From is selected.

message.name: ERR_XFV_TIMER_START_MUST_NOT_BE_SPECIFIED_IF_DURATION_NOT_SET
message.locale: Duration must be entered if Timer Start is selected.

message.name: ERR_XFV_WARNING_REACHED_MUST_NOT_BE_SPECIFIED_IF_DURATION_NOT_SET
message.locale: Duration must be entered if Warning Reached is selected.

message.name: ERR_XFV_DEADLINE_NOT_ACHIEVED_MUST_NOT_BE_SPECIFIED_IF_DURATION_NOT_SET
message.locale: Duration must be entered if Deadline Not Achieved is selected.

message.name: ERR_XFV_WARNING_REACHED_MUST_NOT_BE_SPECIFIED_IF_WARNING_DAYS_NOT_SET
message.locale: Warning Days must be entered if Warning Reached is entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_RESUME_FROM_MUST_NOT_BE_SPECIFIED_IF_RESUME_TIMER_NOT_SET
message.locale: Resume Timer must be selected if Resume From is selected.

message.name: ERR_XFV_EXTENSION_ALLOWED_MUST_NOT_BE_SPECIFIED_IF_DURATION_NOT_SET
message.locale: Duration must be entered if End Date Extension Allowed is selected.

message.name: ERR_XFV_EXTENSION_APPROVAL_MUST_NOT_BE_SPECIFIED_IF_DURATION_NOT_SET
message.locale: Duration must be entered if Extension Approval Required is selected.

message.name: ERR_XFV_APPROVAL_REQUIRED_MUST_NOT_BE_SPECIFIED_IF_EXTENSION_ALLOWED_NOT_SET
message.locale: End Date Extension Allowed must be selected if Extension Approval Required is selected.

message.name: INF_PROGRAM_TIMER_NAME
message.locale: %1s Timer

message.name: ERR_XFV_PROGRAM_REOPENED_WORKFLOW_MUST_NOT_BE_SPECIFIED_IF_REOPEN_ALLOWED_NOT_SET
message.locale: Reopen Available must be selected if Program Reopened is selected.

message.name: ERR_XFV_RESUME_TIMER_MUST_NOT_BE_SPECIFIED_IF_REOPEN_ALLOWED_NOT_SET
message.locale: Reopen Available must be selected if Resume Timer is selected.

message.name: ERR_XFV_PROGRAMS_CONFIGURED_INCORRECTLY_FOR_USE_APPLICATION_CASE_PROPERTY
message.locale: The following programs have not been configured correctly and as a result an application could not be created on the system: %1s. Please contact your system administrator.

message.name: ERR_XFV_RESUME_FROM_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED_IF_RESUME_TIMER
message.locale: The Resume From must be selected if Resume Timer is selected.
